title: 'Finish Your Game' push notification behavior (for Rally game)
custom_expected: User should get a push notification that reminds them to complete their game of Rally

custom_steps_separated.content:
Positive TC
* If user made a pick in an EZ play game
* It has been 15 minutes since user's last pick

Note: per Donna: “15 minutes” is the minimum time - we use an interval of 15 minutes but the job runs every 5 minutes so it could be 20 minutes before you get the push notification.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
* User made a pick and backgrounds the app, user receives a push notification
* User made a pick and user is inside the app, user does not get a push notification
* User made a pick and logged off, user does not receive push notification

custom_steps_separated.content:
Positive TC
* If user hasn’t completed their EZ play game
* It has been 15 minutes since user's last pick
custom_steps_separated.expected:
* If user has one (or more) picks left, user received a push notification
* If user completed the game, user does not receive a push notification (per new update - user still receives PN notification if the first iterations has ended and the second iteration has not started yet)

custom_steps_separated.content: EC - When user should still get push notifications
custom_steps_separated.expected:
* If user made only one pick and this pick got voided - user still receives a push notification
* If user made only one pick and this pick got withdrawn - user still receives a push notification

custom_steps_separated.content: User should receive a push notification for each EZ play game user plays. User should only receive one push notification per game.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
* If user played 1 game - User receives one push notification for the game user played. (only one notification)
* If user played 5 games - User receives five push notifications for the games user played (only one of each notification)

custom_steps_separated.content: User should only receive this for their first iteration in a contest.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
* If user plays first iteration - user receives the push notification
* If user plays second (or more) iteration - user does not receive this push notification

custom_steps_separated.content: If the user has Rally notifications disabled, this notification should never be sent.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
* If user's notification is enabled in device settings and profile - user receives the push notification
* If user's notification is enabled in device settings and disabled in profile - user does not receive the notification
* If users notification is disabled in device settings and profile - user does not receive the push notification

custom_steps_separated.content: EC - User only receive push notification when game is live
custom_steps_separated.expected:
* User does not receive the push notification for scheduled games
   - Play scheduled contest, no push notification is received
* User does not receive the push notification for final games a pick for the 
   - Make a pick for the game that will go final within 15 minutes, no push notification is received

body: Complete them all to earn XP and compete for prizes!

When user enters a valid email

valid emails include:

user@gmail.com
user+@gmail.com
user-@gmail.com
user?@gmail.com
user=/-+@gmail.com
user%20@gmail.com
andi2019p@mlb.com

custom_steps_separated.content: The nickname criteria are
custom_steps_separated.expected:
1. nicknames should not be unique
2. must be 6-15 characters long
3. must contain only letters and numbers 
4. can not contain spaces and special characters
5. can not contain non-English characters 
6. can not be disruptive or offensive
7. can not contain emoji

custom_steps_separated.expected: the error message is displayed 'Nickname must be 6-15 characters long'

custom_steps_separated.content: If the nickname contains special characters
custom_steps_separated.expected: the error message is displayed 'Nickname must contain only letters and numbers'

custom_steps_separated.content: If the nickname disruptive or offensive
custom_steps_separated.expected: the error message is displayed: 'Please choose another nickname'

custom_steps_separated.expected:

 - No special characters
 - One number
 - One uppercase letter
 - One lowercase letter
 - 8-15 characters

custom_steps_separated.content: Tap Sign Up
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Things are displayed:

3. Sign Up button

I acknowledge that my registration and game information will be shared with MGM Resorts INTL and its subsidiaries and affiliates, including ROAR Digital.

Boilerplate agreement displayed at bottom, containing links to:
- Official Rules
- Terms of Use

And the following privacy policies:
- MLB
- MGM Resorts
- BetMGM

custom_steps_separated.expected: Logos and team names are readable and are of uniform size and quality

Welcome page is displayed, with the same boilerplate agreement and links as listed in step 2. (Welcome and name is center aligned)

custom_steps_separated.expected: Each link navigates to the appropriate page

custom_steps_separated.content: After user watches all slides and taps 'Got It'

title: 'What is Rally' tutorial
custom_expected: At the end of the sign up flow user is presented with 'What is Rally' tutorial. Should only display for user once. If user has seen it, don’t ever show it again. The only way to see it after logging in / signing up when user goes to Home tab.

custom_steps_separated.content: First slide
custom_steps_separated.expected:
* 'What is Rally'
* animated video
* title: 'Pick what will happen when players bat.'

custom_steps_separated.expected:

* title: 'Watch live to see if you picked right.'

![](index.php?/attachments/get/9799307)

* title: 'Try and get the most picks correct.'

![](index.php?/attachments/get/9799308)

custom_steps_separated.expected:
* 'What is Rally'
* animated video

custom_steps_separated.expected: User is brought up to Home tab

title: Trophy award/modal flow 2020/2021 - if user played in 2020
custom_expected:
* Starting on Opening Day 2021, the first time a player logs in who has a NONZERO XP value for 2020, they should be shown a screen where they are awarded a trophy
* This flow only happens 1 time
* This modal should be set up to be the highest-priority modal - even if additional modals are added in the future.

custom_steps_separated.content: Player is awarded a Season Trophy for their 2020 performance
custom_steps_separated.expected:
* 'Your 2020 Trophy' headline
* Player ranking ia displayed from 2020 season
* 2020 throphy is displayed
* Fireworks appear around the trophy
* Text 'You earned the rank of Legend for the 2020 season. Your trophy was added to your Profile'
* Enable 'Next' button

![](index.php?/attachments/get/6597477)

custom_steps_separated.content: When clicking on 'Next' button
custom_steps_separated.expected: It takes user to 'Welcome to the 2021 Season' modal

custom_steps_separated.content: When getting to the second screen, the amount of Player XP that they have is then reset to 0, and their Player Ranking is reset to “Prospect”
custom_steps_separated.expected:
* 'Welcome to the 2021 Season' headline
* Player Ranking is reset to “Prospect”
* Player XP is reset to 0
* Trophy background with a question mark
* Text 'The path to becoming a 2021 MLB Legend starts here. Are you up for the challenge?'
* 'I'm Ready!' button


![](index.php?/attachments/get/6597478)

custom_steps_separated.content: Clicking on 'I'm Ready!' button
custom_steps_separated.expected: Clicking “I’m Ready” closes the modal and taking user to the Home screen.

custom_steps_separated.content: User views his profile page, the 2020 trophy is added.
custom_steps_separated.expected: ![](index.php?/attachments/get/6597479)

title: Trophy modal 2021 - if user didn't play 2020

custom_steps_separated.content: If user didn't play Rally in 2020 season and opens the app in 2021 season.
custom_steps_separated.expected: The 2020 modal should NOT appear, and no trophy should be awarded.

This modal should be set up to be the highest-priority modal - even if additional modals are added in the future. 
This modal is shown first out of all modals.

Starting on Opening Day, the first time the player opens Rally 'Welcome to the 2021 Season' modal is displayed. This flow only happens 1 time.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/6597480)

custom_steps_separated.content: Clicking on 'I'm Ready!' button
custom_steps_separated.expected: Clicking “I’m Ready” closes the modal and taking user to the Home screen.

custom_steps_separated.content: User views his profile page, the 2020 trophy is added.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
2020 trophy is not there. The first trophy placeholder is 2021.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/6863848)

custom_steps_separated.content: User logs in the app after opening day - user played the 2020 season
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Modal flow: 

* 2020 thropies modal is displayed
* 2021 modal is displayed

Trophies modal is the priority modal

custom_steps_separated.content: Test the above step while any other modal is active for the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: Trophies modal is displayed first

custom_steps_separated.content: User logs in the app after opening day - user did not play the 2020 season
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Modal flow: 

* 2021 modal is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: User logs in the app after opening day - user's profile was created in 2020 but user has 0 XP
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Modal flow: 

* 2021 modal is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: If users re-logs in to the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: The modal is not shown
